attributes.action: Calculate Tax credits on an Income & Outgoings basis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because tax credits are calculated by Income only the people who buy thier houses and go back to work are penalised for doing so, we have an average income of 2000 a month which makes us uneligabe for child tax credit, but i have a 600 mortgage and £470 childminders fees, and thats bfore we have paid for food, utility bills, council tax etc, But if i chose to stay at home and live off benefits i would be financially better off as i would have more coming in and less out, there is NO incentive for people to EARN thier money anymore!
